_description: On the mercy of Jesus — three monorhyming lines between the Latin ones they translate

Ghent317.Transcription:
Videlicet quando plus cogaste de p[ ]Wan tyati mournnest
                        me[st]vel quando plus dolorem habet [ ]And hym likes aldyr
                        lesttunc test peties s oracio sua melior[ ]þan hes hys
                    bone best
Ghent317.Note:
Folio is verso of last leaf in MS, dirty and worn; this verse written to
                    the right of 5367, into gutter,
                    so ends of lines lost.
Ghent317.Editions:
Logeman,  Henri. 
             “Miscellen aus einer Ghenten handschrift.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         87 (1891): 431-2: 432.
